contentrichtext.text: {{Expand French|date=December 2008|La Brévière}} {{Infobox French commune |name = La Brévière |region = Basse-Normandie |department = Calvados |arrondissement = Lisieux |canton = Livarot |INSEE = 14105 |postal code = 14140 |mayor = Jean-Louis Blin |term = 2008–2014 |intercommunality = Pays de Livarot |longitude = 0.1644 |latitude = 48.9733 |elevation m = 90 |elevation min m = 69 |elevation max m = 182 |area km2 = 3.53 |population = 118 |population date = 2008 }} '''La Brévière''' is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Calvados]] [[Departments of France|department]] in the [[Basse-Normandie]] [[Regions of France|region]] in northwestern [[France]]. ==Population== {{Historical populations |align=left| 1962|112| 1968|100| 1975|77| 1982|103| 1990|120| 1999|128| 2008|118 }} {{clear-left}} ==See also== *[[Communes of the Calvados department]] ==References== *[http://www.insee.fr/en/home/home_page.asp INSEE] {{reflist}} {{commonscat}} {{Calvados communes}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Breviere}} [[Category:Communes of Calvados]] {{Calvados-geo-stub}}
